attributes.additional_details: The public has rights to choose their PM and with what Rishi Sunak has stated in the last few days this needs to be down to the public who he believes he is helping.
attributes.background: Rishi Sunak is at risk of violating the public human rights due to wanting to change laws to fit his ideals.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/641904
